hero.subheading2: or fill out the form below and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.heading: About Us
hero.subheading1: At CoreCapacity, our goal is to revolutionize core muscle training.
hero.subheading2: We help people, wherever they are, to improve physical and mental health by activating their core muscles. We believe that better core strength provides better performance, health, and quality of life.

founder.heading: About the Founder
founder.bio1: The professional expertise of founder and owner Tor Einar Sandvikmoen is high. He is a trained physiotherapist and certified at the highest level in the neurac (Neuromuscular Activation) treatment method and has previously educated and certified physiotherapists internationally, as well as being a member of the Norwegian Teaching Group associated with this community. Sandvikmoen has some experience as a former project manager in connection with the development and patenting of training equipment and as a contributor to several master's theses and Springbrett for Connect Norge. He has also worked as a consultant for Redcord and been involved in testing and developing the Stimula treatment device, as well as contributing to the development of the Neurac treatment method. Sandvikmoen developed a special exercise for activating the innermost core muscle, the Iliopsoas. The exercise was given the resounding name "Sandvikmoen" and is used internationally by physiotherapists.
founder.bio2: We believe that the expertise of the team / advisory board and project manager helps to ensure the quality of the development of the CoreCapacity method. The team of contributors that has now been assembled and tested, including through pilot research, makes us confident that we can achieve our goals, and it reduces the risk regarding further development work. We feel that we can source the most important and necessary expertise for this project in Norway and in Kristiansand, but we also draw on resources and expertise from abroad when necessary.

mission.heading: Our mission is to help people achieve better physical and mental health—wherever they are.
mission.text1: We see several signs of a paradigm shift in the debate around the understanding and importance of core musculature. We will try as best we can to build a bridge between old and new knowledge. Our contribution with pilot research happens through conscious choices to collaborate with various professional communities in Norway, to form the basis for a more holistic and interdisciplinary understanding of mechanisms in the body that we still do not fully understand.
mission.text2: Our method has been shown to provide over 10.5% better performance for national team athletes, measured by Olympiatoppen and UiA. This is more than double what other methods have previously achieved in just 8 weeks.
mission.text3: For most people, this can mean an extra 20-30 meters on their golf drive. Or, as for 5-time Norwegian swimming champion Oskar Erklev; winning gold in events you were never a medal candidate for before.
mission.text4: CoreCapacity is taking the lead in the paradigm shift within core training. We do this, among other things, by driving our own research. The results of the research are implemented directly into our digital platform.
mission.text5: Our platform offers dynamic and personal customization for the best possible results, whether you are an athlete, a fitness enthusiast, or a regular employee who wants a better quality of life.

science.heading: The Science Behind
science.text1: Our unique method is based on research and scientifically documented practices. Through extensive collaboration with experts in various fields, we have developed training methods that combine dynamic exercises with the latest scientific research on core musculature. Unlike outdated static exercises, our approach is innovative, effective, and adaptable to all levels of physical fitness.
science.text2: CoreCapacity is not just about physical training – it's about building knowledge. Through our digital platform, we offer video tutorials, training programs, and scientifically supported insights that ensure you are training in the best way for your body's needs.

t1.quote:
"Core Capacity has given young paddlers in Kristiansand Kayak Club a completely new strength in their core muscles – which has quickly yielded results in the form of better performances and international medals. I am convinced that this method can elevate athletes at all levels." 
 "Had I known about Core Capacity when I was competing as a paddler, it could have made a big difference in my career. Now I see how the method gives young athletes clear progress and a solid foundation for further development." 
 "With the digitalization of Core Capacity, athletes and fitness enthusiasts all over the world will be able to train their core in a new and effective way. Tor Einar's expertise and method can help elevate both Norwegian and international sports."
t1.name: Hakeem, Teland
t1.title: Former Norwegian Champion in Kayaking

t2.quote: "All the swimmers who participated in the CoreCapacity project set personal records during the NM long course this Summer. The progress was significant for several of them. The athletes perceived that the exercises had a high transfer value to swimming, especially for crawl and backstroke. The exercises were also perceived as challenging and 'fun', and led to increased motivation and belief that they could perform better in the water. I would like to build on this in the land/dry-land training for the swimmers in Vågsbygd SLK."
t2.name: Geir Thorstensen
t2.title: Coach Vågsbygd SLK/Team Sør

t3.quote: "The sessions with CoreCapacity definitely increased my core muscle strength and had a direct transfer value to my swimming; I improved all my times in backstroke and crawl by a good margin and took NM gold in events I had never been a medal candidate for before. Access to the training videos via CoreCapacity's app makes it optimal for me to adapt and log the core exercises in a busy training schedule. My achievements during the NM in July 2024; Junior gold in 200 butterfly, 200 medley, 400 medley, and 100 backstroke. Junior silver in 100 butterfly and bronze in 50 backstroke. Senior gold in 400 medley, silver in 200 butterfly and 4x200 free relay, and bronze in 100 butterfly."
t3.name: Oskar Erklev
t3.title: Norwegian Champion in Swimming

plan1.title: Get Started
plan1.description: Perfect for beginners! This level focuses on building a solid foundation by activating core muscles with simple exercises. Ideal for those just starting their fitness journey, or wanting better posture and increased general strength.
features: Basic exercises for core muscle activation
Track your progress from day one

plan2.title: Challenge Your Core
plan2.description: The medium level introduces more dynamic movements to strengthen core muscles and improve stability. Perfect for those with some training experience who want to challenge themselves further.
features: Dynamic movements for a stronger core

plan3.title: Master Your Core Training
plan3.description: Developed for experienced fitness enthusiasts and athletes. The advanced level offers intensive and more complex core exercises to help you reach peak performance and maximize muscle activation.
features: Advanced core exercises for maximum muscle activation
For athletes or those with high fitness goals

items.description: The app focuses on health-promoting measures that prevent musculoskeletal disorders, contributing to better health and reduced sick leave.

items.description: The app is based on research showing significant performance-enhancing effects on core musculature.

about.title: About Core Capacity
about.p1: Our mission is to help people achieve better physical and mental health by activating the core muscles – no matter where they are.
about.p2: Through carefully developed training videos, we guide users from level 1 to level 3, focusing on gradual and safe strengthening of the core. By taking small steps each week, you can unlock your body’s full potential.
about.p3: Registering in our app is the first step toward a healthier and stronger version of yourself – all it takes is determination and consistent effort to achieve lasting results.
about.image_alt: Two people exercising on the floor

cta.title: Unlock your potential with core-focused training led by experts – supported by research and shown to improve performance by over 10.5%.
cta.p1: Whether you spend long days at work or push your limits as an athlete, core strength is key. Activate and strengthen your core for better posture, reduced discomfort, and improved performance.
cta.p2: Our app makes it easy to stay focused and see results – choose from three levels designed to strengthen your core and elevate your training. Start today!

app_mockup.title: Change your life
app_mockup.p1: Core Capacity is a platform designed to help you unlock your full potential, build strength, and support your overall health and well-being
app_mockup.p2: It gives you the tools to strengthen both body and mind – and boosts confidence and focus with every step you take.
app_mockup.p3: Measurements of the effect on young athletes who followed the Core Capacity concept showed a performance increase of over 12% in just 8 weeks.

dynamic.heroSubtitle: A groundbreaking training application designed to revolutionize core training
dynamic.sectionTitle: CoreCapacity: Strengthen your core, improve your life
dynamic.missionText: Our mission is simple: to help people activate their core muscles, and thereby improve both physical and mental health. By combining proven methods with both digital and analog guidance, CoreCapacity gives users the opportunity to improve their core strength at their own level.
dynamic.benefitsText: This leads to better performance, reduced sick leave at the workplace, and a generally healthier lifestyle. Our scientifically backed training program is not just about strength – it is about building a foundation for better overall performance and a healthier, more balanced life.
dynamic.trainingTitle: Core activation training program videos - with documented performance improvement of over 10.5%
dynamic.trainingP1: We focus on dynamic core exercises that effectively activate the core musculature. Research shows that dynamic, integrated exercises such as squats and deadlifts activate the core just as well – or better – than traditional isolated exercises like the plank.
dynamic.trainingP2: CoreCapacity's training program is based on dynamic exercises supported by research, which have shown clear performance improvements – including an increase in athletic performance of over 10.5%. This effect is confirmed in studies comparing static and dynamic exercises.
dynamic.trainingP3: This approach is supported by recent research showing that functional exercises, where multiple joints and muscle groups work together, activate the core more effectively than static and isolated exercises. These findings underscore the importance of including dynamic movement patterns in training to strengthen the core.
dynamic.trainingSummary: This approach is supported by recent studies showing that functional exercises involving multiple joints and muscle groups activate the core musculature more effectively than static, isolated exercises. The findings underscore the importance of including dynamic movement patterns in a training routine to strengthen the core.
dynamic.healthTitle: Prevents musculoskeletal disorders, improves hormone balance, and increases creativity, productivity, and execution ability.
dynamic.healthP1: CoreCapacity's approach to core training is not just about performance, but also about holistic health and well-being. By integrating core exercises into daily life, the muscles supporting the spine are strengthened, which helps prevent musculoskeletal disorders.
dynamic.healthP2: In addition, core training has a positive effect on hormone balance and can lead to increased productivity and creativity. Studies show that regular training of the core musculature can prevent common ailments such as back pain, improve posture, and even strengthen mental clarity.
dynamic.healthSummary: Core strength for better health: Strengthening the core musculature reduces the risk of injuries and improves posture, which directly affects the ability to perform daily activities more effectively. Regular training increases awareness of the body's movements and makes it easier to maintain good posture in everyday life.
dynamic.levelsTitle: The program is divided into three levels, developed to help users get started with core training.
dynamic.levelsIntro: CoreCapacity's training program is adapted to all fitness levels – from beginners to experienced. The program is structured in three levels, where each level gradually increases in both difficulty and complexity. This approach allows the user to start at their own pace and develop in tandem with increased strength and confidence in training.
dynamic.level1: 1. Introduce basic core exercises with manageable intensity for beginners.
dynamic.level2: 2. Increase intensity and complexity for intermediates, with functional movements and dynamic stabilization.
dynamic.level3: 3. Challenge experienced users with high-intensity exercises that improve power, stability, and endurance.
dynamic.levelsSummary: This step-by-step approach makes the program both accessible and motivating, while ensuring steady progress and engagement throughout the journey towards a stronger core.

metode.heroSubtitle: Effective training for a stronger body
metode.researchP1: Our methodology is built on solid research, and we have focused on the effects of core muscle activation on both physical and mental health parameters. Research has shown that dynamic core muscle exercises can improve performance by 4-6% in athletes in just 8 weeks, which is more than double that of traditional static exercises. This improvement has been confirmed through several studies comparing the effect of static and dynamic exercises.
metode.researchP2: CoreCapacity is supported by a number of studies showing that dynamic exercises not only improve physical performance but can also contribute to increased concentration, better hormonal balance, and even increased creativity and productivity. In line with health-oriented research such as Salutogenesis, we focus on how we can promote health by making activities comprehensible, manageable, and meaningful for users. Our approach builds on health consciousness as a means to help people see how small changes can have a significant impact on health and well-being.
metode.benefit1Desc: Regular core training helps strengthen the muscles supporting the spine and prevents strain injuries.
metode.benefit2Desc: Core training improves posture and reduces the risk of back pain and other musculoskeletal disorders.
metode.benefit3Desc: Strengthening core muscles can lead to improved mental clarity and increased productivity.
metode.benefit4Desc: Research shows that regular exercise can positively affect hormonal balance, which in turn contributes to better health and well-being.
metode.salutoP1: Salutogenesis, which emphasizes health factors such as comprehensibility, manageability, and meaningfulness, is a foundation of our training philosophy. Through CoreCapacity, we help users identify coping resources in their daily lives. This gives them better tools to handle stress and physical strain in a way that not only improves performance but also provides them with better health understanding. We make health improvement both understandable and easily accessible by using research showing the connection between physical activity and mental health, and how to make everyday movements more functional and effective.
metode.videoTitle: How CoreCapacity Transforms Your Fitness Journey
metode.connectionsTitle: The Connections Between Training and Health Improvements
metode.connectionsP1: Research has shown that we can enhance our health and performance through changes in how we move our bodies. Reduced activation of core muscles increases the risk of strain injuries and poor posture, which can lead to injuries such as prolapse or wear and tear.
metode.connectionsP2: By increasing core muscle activation, we can improve the body's general health and reduce the risk of musculoskeletal issues. Our approach is built on research-based methods showing that dynamic core training can have major health benefits in both the short and long term.
metode.strategy1Desc: Think through potential obstacles before they arise to maintain training routines even when life presents challenges.
metode.strategy2Desc: We encourage tracking progress, which provides mental encouragement and increased motivation to continue.
metode.usabilityText: CoreCapacity is not just a training app; it is a holistic solution for activating and strengthening core musculature with a focus on the user's health and quality of life. Through our platform, we offer both structured training sessions and tools to track progress, combined with proven methods for behavioral change. The user gets access to a customized training program based on their individual level and progression, while we utilize innovative methods like AI to further tailor the sessions.
metode.dataTitle: Research and Data Supporting the Effectiveness of Core Training
metode.dataText: The impact of core training on performance and health is not just theoretical; it is documented through several studies showing concrete numbers and effects. For example, research on athletes has shown that effective core training can lead to a performance improvement of over 10%, confirming that our method delivers measurable results. Additionally, we have proof that dynamic core muscle training can prevent musculoskeletal disorders, while simultaneously providing health benefits such as increased productivity, better mood, and improved mental clarity.
